column1: # Example metadata files for TryOnDiffusion training
# This file shows the expected format for your training and validation CSV files
# Copy this format and replace with your actual data paths
# - All paths are relative to the dataset_root directory
# - person_image: Original person image with clothing
# - ca_image: Clothing-agnostic person image (clothing area masked/removed)
# - garment_image: Target garment to be worn
# - person_pose: JSON file with person pose keypoints
# - garment_pose: JSON file with garment pose keypoints
